author: Sarah S
comment: Beautiful Installed on my Huawei and no sign of the time lapse mentioned in some of the older reviews. I have several watch apps and this is my new favourite. Not sure how it will impact on battery life, but shouldn't be a problem for the Huawei.

author: Joanne Wilson
comment: Great looking face, would be nice to have different time options such as analogue and placement.
title: Stunning face, could do with options.

author: Judah Mahay
comment: Worth every penny. Love live watch faces. Great job.
title: Woot

author: Ricardo C
comment: Watch face makes the moto 360 look amazing. Battery life is about the same as an animated facer watch face.  So I have about 20% left after 12 hours of use.  It lags a little on occasion, but that's Motorola's fault for including such a weak processor in the watch. Overall this is awesome.
title: Awesome watchface

author: Jeff Bell
comment: Please fix the lag.  The design and look is awesome but it is compromised by the stuttering  lag.. Makes me regret buying it...
title: Laaaaag!

author: Peggy Coffey
comment: I had it on my Asus zen watch and within 2 minutes my battery was down to 14 percent. Had to uninstall.
title: Loved it but

comment: If the animation was as smooth on my watch as it is in your promo video then u would have a winner
title: Only if
